name: Carlos Segarra
objective: To obtain a position as a web developer where I can utilize my skills and experience to create engaging and user-friendly websites.

skills.technicalProficiencies: Python, Java, JavaScript, PHP | Sanity, SQL, Oracle Cloud Platform | HTML, CSS, Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS
skills.collaboration: Effective team collaboration, Strong communication skills
skills.methodologies: Agile, A/B Testing, Test-driven development, Continuous integration

responsibilities: Maintained a high standard of customer service, promptly addressing inquiries and assisting with product selection to facilitate a positive shopping experience.
Developed in-depth knowledge of store inventory to provide accurate information and recommendations to customers.
Handled point-of-sale operations with responsibility for efficient and accurate transaction processing.
Managed client interaction data via Salesforce CRM, enhancing data accuracy and reliability.
Automated Salesforce-based processes, reducing task completion time and bolstering team productivity.
Mentored and onboarded incoming project assistants, promoting swift team integration and role proficiency.

projects.title: Statically & AI-Generated Blog Post Website
projects.description: Built a student-oriented website using Next.js and Sanity, featuring AI-aided content and responsive design elements.
achievements: Utilized AI for creating engaging content and implemented a GDPR-compliant privacy modal using Tailwind CSS and Radix UI.
Applied A/B testing for enhancing user engagement and worked effectively within a development team using agile methodologies.

projects.title: AudioNook - Music Trading Platform Development
projects.description: Led the development and project management of AudioNook, an online platform for digitally collecting and trading physical music formats.
achievements: Implemented Discogs API integration for seamless access to a vast music database.
Developed features for digital collection management and facilitated trading of physical music formats.
Demonstrated strong leadership and organizational skills in overseeing the project from conception to delivery.
Utilized web development skills to create a user-friendly interface and ensure a smooth user experience.
